PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2019-00752019-01-31,  ,  ,  ,  FIN,  , 
ActCustoms Tariff
SubjectOrder Amending the Order Imposing a Surtax on the Importation of Certain Steel Goods
PrecisOrder Amending the Order Imposing a SURTAX ON THE IMPORTATION OF CERTAIN STEEL GOODS in order to (1) establish exclusive 200-day surtax-free quotas for energy tubular products and wire rod of 72,820 tonnes and 16,776 tonnes, respectively, for imports originating in Mexico; (2) remove the breakdown of the 200-day quotas into 50-day segments for imports originating in Mexico; (3) adjust the 50-day and 200-day quotas for energy tubular products and wire rod from non-Mexico sources by deducting Mexicoâ€™s share of the original quota based on historical import volumes; and, (4) adjust the percentage of the quota for non-Mexico imports that may be filled by imports originating in a single country to reflect the removal of imports from Mexico from the 200-day quota.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2019-0035 Publication Date: 2019-02-20
AttachmentsAttachment
